title: Schools in india
content: - Schools are institutions designed to provide **education** to students.
They offer a structured learning environment with **teachers** and **curriculum**.
Schools play a crucial role in shaping individuals and society.
image_desc: A colorful image of a school building with children playing in the playground.
narration: Schools are the foundation of our society, providing education and shaping future generations. They offer a structured environment where students learn from teachers and engage with curriculum.
